Edit_menu module¶

Module wich contains the EditMenu class and some functions linked to this menu

Functions:

CheckPySyntax([prog, args])

Entry point for the script “pyflakes”.

my_speak(frame, txt)

Speak the texte given in params by creating a thread dedicated

Classes:

EditMenu(frame)

Inits a instance of a wx.Menu to create a Theme menu and his buttons (Copy, Paste, Find,…)
class Edit_menu.EditMenu(frame)¶

Bases: wx._core.Menu

Inits a instance of a wx.Menu to create a Theme menu and his buttons (Copy, Paste, Find,…)

Returns

the Theme menu filled by buttons

Return type

wx.Menu see https://wxpython.org/Phoenix/docs/html/wx.Menu.html

Methods:
